text:
**Update** ❤️

Everything is back to normal — you can now safely send gifts to **@GiftsToPortals**

All deposits will be delivered to you. If something is missing, reach out **@portals_sup**

**Attention ****❤️**

We’re currently facing issues with the Bot API. Please **do not deposit gifts for now**

If you already sent gifts — don’t worry. They’re safe, and we’ll make sure they reach you later

Stay tuned for updates
